Sentencas: The present study focuses on modeling the solid oxide fuel cell power plant combined with an absorption-ejection refrigeration cycle.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell energy system with absorption-ejection refrigeration optimized using a neural network with multiple objectives

Sentencas: First, a comparison is made between the absorption chiller refrigeration cycle and the absorption-ejection chiller to connect the superior cycle to the solid oxide fuel cell as an auxiliary cycle.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell energy system with absorption-ejection refrigeration optimized using a neural network with multiple objectives

Sentencas: Then, the solid oxide fuel cell cycle, the combustion of the output product, the heat recovery unit combined with the refrigeration cycle, and freshwater production are modeled.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell energy system with absorption-ejection refrigeration optimized using a neural network with multiple objectives

Sentencas: Next, the sensitivity analysis is presented in order to study the effect of the design parameters on objective functions, which simplifies the justification of the optimization results based on the genetic algorithm.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell energy system with absorption-ejection refrigeration optimized using a neural network with multiple objectives

Sentencas: In order to perform optimization, machine learning methods have been employed to reduce computational time and cost.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell energy system with absorption-ejection refrigeration optimized using a neural network with multiple objectives

Sentencas: The optimization of this cycle shows that the exergy efficiency is enhanced up to 68%, whereas the overall cost rate is in within 9.7-10.4 dollars per hour.
Titulo: Solid oxide fuel cell energy system with absorption-ejection refrigeration optimized using a neural network with multiple objectives
